Room.Name: Pixie Glenn
Room.ShortDescription: You are in small glen, surrounded by a riot of wildflowers in bloom.
Room.LongDescription: You feel a little lightheaded because of the pixie dust in the air. As you stand here, the air snaps and sparkles as pixies dart about. There is a tension in in the air as well, as though magic was all about you. The glenn is totally surrounded by a tall hedge, and a gap can be seen to the south. To the north, on the other side of the hedge, you hear a yowling noise like a tomcat in heat.
